summary: Cosimo gets a plan for a huge job from his cellmate. He asks his woman to find a patsy for his bungled car theft, offering $15,000. Suddenly, 7 are involved.
cast: William H. Macy|Isaiah Washington|Sam Rockwell|Michael Jeter|Luis Guzmán|John Buck Jr.|Patricia Clarkson|Andy Davoli|Brett C. Leonard|Frank O'Donnell|Peter Veneziano|Bernard Canepari|Art Oughton|Ray Calabrese|George Clooney|Annie Kitral|Lissy Gulick|Dorothy Silver|Maryanne Nagel|David Warshofsky|Jennifer Esposito|Gabrielle Union|Don Kost|June Lang|Basil Russo|Angela Russo-Otstot|Wayne S. Turney|Rohn Thomas|Lawrence Clark-Bey|Doug Hawley|Rae Sunshine Lee|Danny Lentz|Blaine Pate|Roger Petan|Ann Russo|Paul Hobson Sadler|Mychelle Vasvary
title: Bienvenidos a Collinwood
